source: Compiled from clawhub.ai (main site, skills page), GitHub repo (openclaw/clawhub), Reddit lists, documentation guides, and web searches for OpenClaw/ClawHub skills. Expanded from v1.0 to include more skills from community sources, as direct sub-page crawls returned insufficient content. Total approximate skills: 5,705 (per Feb 7, 2026 data). Install commands standardized to 'clawhub install skill-name'. Notes: Full listings not available on public pagesâ€”many 'Coming Soon' or paginated; prioritized top/popular skills per category for authenticity. Use for MyndLens reference: RAG to retrieve, MCP to chain/build hybrids. Stored internally for future retrieval/updates.

categories.name: AI/ML Skills
categories.description: Artificial intelligence and machine learning skills for OpenClaw agents. Includes model integration, NLP, embeddings, RAG, and AI automation tools.
categories.top_skills_note: Expanded with additional skills from searches/guides; e.g., mcporter for MCP integration. Full 1,588 not detailed.

skills.name: Capability Evolver
skills.description: AI self-evolution engine for OpenClaw agents. Enhances agent capabilities through continuous learning and adaptation.
skills.required_tools: None specified; integrates with base OC.
skills.usage_examples: Evolve agent for new task: /evolve 'learn image processing'
